JobFullDesc: Communication is a core human need and is central to Facebook's mission to bring the world closer together. Every day, more than a billion people send billions of messages, spend billions of minutes on calls, and message with millions of large and small business across the FB family of apps. Messenger is building a universal way for people to connect and be closer together. We are looking for a leader for our Messenger Data Engineering team to work closely with Product Managers, Data Scientists and Software Engineers to support building out a great platform for the future of computing. In this role, you’ll see a direct link between your work, company growth, and user satisfaction. You’ll work with some of the brightest minds in the industry, work with one of the richest data sets in the world, use cutting edge technology, and see your efforts affect products and people on a regular basis.The ideal candidate will have strong data infrastructure, data architecture, and business intelligence skills. Candidates should also have a proven track record of leading and scaling data teams, strong operational skills to drive efficiency and speed, strong project management leadership, and a strong vision
